text: Goe gu gidee labelaa di hadu dela ne doo iha i di gowaa helemodu, ne doo iha hua i deia, ga nngenge i di ada dangada dela ne hai gi nia baalanga, baalanga mmee, nia gelegele, silber mo goolo. Malaa, di God Aamua gu haga modongoohia adu gi di goe nia mee ala gaa hai maalia. Malaa deelaa, au guu hagi adu gi di goe dau midi la hagatau mo dono hadinga.”
